summary: This mod makes the Greybeard robes playable and craftable. They are enchanted so there is no cooldown for shouts, just like the Greybeards.
descriptionHtml:
This mod makes the Greybeard robes playable and craftable. They are enchanted so there is no cooldown for shouts, just like the Greybeards. The robes consists of the tunic, hood, and boots. They require no smithing perks to craft (may change in later updates) and are in the misc. section.

Crafting it requires leather, leather strips, void salts, and a filled common soul gem.

If you don't want to craft the robes, they can be found at the skyforge.

No DLC is required.
author: chasewj1
